components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays from Twilio Toll-Free Numbers to US Carriers

incident_updates.body:
Please find the current MMS delivery status from Twilio Toll-Free for the major carriers below:

AT&T (status -  Operational)
T-Mobile (status -  Operational)
Verizon (status -  Delayed)
MetroPCS (status -  Operational)
US Cellular (status -  Operational)

We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body:
Due to sustained high traffic on the US carrier networks, we are currently experiencing MMS delivery delays from Twilio Toll-Free numbers. Messages are queued due to capacity shortage, and customers may see delays when sending to certain US carriers.

Please find the current delivery status for the major carriers below:

For US Networks, use the following:
AT&T (status -  Operational)
T-Mobile (status -  Operational)
Verizon (status -  Delayed)
MetroPCS (status -  Operational)
US Cellular (status -  Operational)

We are actively working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Eritel Network in Eritrea

incident_updates.body: We continue observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Eritel network in Eritrea. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: After monitoring for some time, we started seeing a degradation of the service. We're experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Eritel network in Eritrea. We are actively working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share.

incident_updates.body: Due to increased traffic demand on mobile communication networks, we are expecting potential congestion for US carrier networks during the Black Friday and Cyber Monday period. Customers may experience intermittent SMS and MMS delivery delays. Please refer to our Black Friday / Cyber Monday FAQ page for more information at https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/4411075931163-Advisory-Potential-Message-Delays-During-Black-Friday-Cyber-Monday-and-Elections-2024

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Australia and New Zealand is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 12 December 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 03 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
05 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 05 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
10 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 10 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
12 December 2024 at 01:00 PST until 12 December 2024 at 04:00 PST
